# core-toggle

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                                                                                                                                   | Type                                                | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`           | `alt`            | If applied, the element is rendered with the alternate styling.                                                                                                               | `boolean`                                           | `false`     |
| `checked`       | `checked`        | If applied, the element is checked.                                                                                                                                           | `boolean`                                           | `false`     |
| `color`         | `color`          | Optional color of the icon. Defaults to `blue`. Use the following `@color` in [core-primitives](https://unpkg.com/@core-ds/primitives/core-primitives.css) without `@color-`. | `"black" \| "blue" \| "green" \| "red" \| "yellow"` | `"blue"`    |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | If applied, the user cannot interact with the element.                                                                                                                        | `boolean`                                           | `false`     |
| `label`         | `label`          | The label element associated with the element.                                                                                                                                | `string`                                            | `undefined` |
| `labelPosition` | `label-position` | The label element position.                                                                                                                                                   | `"left" \| "right"`                                 | `"right"`   |
| `required`      | `required`       | If applied, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form containing this element.                                                                                   | `boolean`                                           | `false`     |
| `size`          | `size`           | Apply the pre-defined large element size styling.                                                                                                                             | `"default" \| "large"`                              | `"default"` |
